item.title: My first blog
item.description:
Hi all,

This is my very first blog post using jekyll and github togeter. The idea is to write about my scientific achievments and struggles during the way. Maybe someone can even use this.

For now, I will just play a bit around, so donâ€™t expect anything to serious right away.
